website_summaries.verdict: Popular style of kitchen microwave cart that looks great and provides plenty of storage.
pros: Stylish look with a light-colored natural wood cart top and a dark espresso finish on the main cart
Top shelf measures about 33 by 18 inches to accommodate large microwaves
Offers plenty of room for storage underneath the top shelf, including three side shelves, a drawer, and a cabinet
cons: Tough to assemble with unclear directions

website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, good-looking kitchen cart that has nearly everything most consumers will need. Once assembly is accomplished, it's a worthwhile kitchen investment with numerous uses and features.
pros: Absolutely packed with handy features and storage space, thanks to its three shelves, spacious top and drawer, cabinet, and towel bar
Attractive two-tone finish pairs well with most kitchen decor
cons: Manufacturer recommends a helper for assembly, which is challenging
A few customers report misaligned drawers and doors

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Coffee Bar!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this product enough. Sturdy, Practical, Quality looking piece for the price. Everyone who has come over has commented on this coffee bar. Putting it together is a PAIN the directions are terrible....but after it is built you won't regret the purchase for the price!!! I've attached a picture to show the size and setup. I also purchased a small black trashcan from Walmart to attach to the side of the cart (where the paper towel roll is designed to go.....it just makes it so convenient to dump your k-cups into the recycle bag.
customer_reviews.author: baseballmom

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you're trying to induce a mentalbreakdown
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this item 0/5 stars. It took forever to arrive. The instructions are nearly impossible to decipher. The real problem though?? None of the backing pieces were cut square or to size. Because it's s***ty composite board, unless you own a bunch of wood working tools to basically measure and cut down your own wood, 30% of the required pieces to complete assembly aren't usable. Since I'm not a carpenter, now I'm just out $180 with a messier kitchen than before. I wish I had saved myself the money and frustration - I've bought and assembled lots of furniture from amazon and didn't expect perfection, just a usable product.
customer_reviews.author: scameron

customer_reviews.title: Shocker: Real wood, complete set, durable construction!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated buying this for six weeks because I assumed it would be mediocre construction with lots of cheap pressboard. I was wrong. This is solid, beautifully-stained wood, with a lovely counter-top. Sure, it's not the same quality as an custom-made oak cabinet, but it's a fraction of the cost. After a couple months, everything works perfectly, with no signs of wear. All the parts were there, and instructions were reasonably clear. Assembly time was less than 90 minutes, and I enjoyed the process. There are a few points you might want a second set of hands. In all, I was surprisingly impressed, and really glad that we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Dru Lattin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our current needs.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It fits perfectly in our smaller kitchen. Now, I just wish we could fit a couple bar stools but it might not be big enough. Definitely gave us the extra prep and counter space we were looking for. I just finished building it today. We'll have to see how well it lasts. Assembly was really easy, even without labeled parts. I was able to build it without any assistance and I'm a female on the slim side.
customer_reviews.author: HDBailey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this kitchen island. Before purchasing it I read a few reviews and questions which helped in deciding that I would buy it and it fits so well in my small area. It took longer than an hour to put together even though I'm good with tools. Using the Hex wrench for me is a bit challenging. I would suggest having a second hand although not necessary. I needed the storage and the hidden compartment is an added value.
customer_reviews.author: LA Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a large microwave & badly needed counter & storage space. This kitchen cart seemed the best fit based on reviews, price, value & ease of assembly. Received my kitchen cart in mint condition. Immaculate packing, not a scratch. Instructions were fairly simple, assembly very easy. A second pair of hands & a workbench will be helpful but I managed alone with minimal fumbling. The magnetic latch is very cheap I cracked one side while tightening the screws. Also it would be extremely helpful if each individual piece is labeled. Overall a solid piece for the price. Great value!!
customer_reviews.author: Sir Duke

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: the drawer sticks a little so not super high quality, but it looks pretty nice, doesn't look super cheap. decent qaulitly otherwise, sturdy. Citting top is thick although it scratches terribly instantly if you actually cut on it. I just put a cuttin gboard down now instead. Prob need a treatment or something first. All and all I'm really happy with it. has good storage and added a great amount of work top spapce for cooking in my kitchen with fairly limited counter space. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Visgauss

customer_reviews.title: Its a good product but Horrible Instruction Booklet.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself looks good.. The only small issue that I have is that one of the shelves has a dent or is a slight U shape in the middle like if it bent , which luckily I just placed so it faces the back towards the wall so isn't as noticeable... I was able to build this in less than 2hrs by myself (note i was distracted watching TV when doing so) and probably would have done it faster had the instructions been better and the pieces labeled in some way which would have made it a lot easier..
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Did you know?
customer_reviews.text: Since Amazon is making war on the natural world by firing employees who dare to speak out against climate change, we must do it for them. This is not up for debate or for too-rich corporations to capitalize on. Do what you can to fight climate change by reducing your dependence on fossil fuels/plastic and the use of poisons and weed/insect killer. For the life of us all! PLEASE, do what you can --- and plant a tree!
customer_reviews.author: Seeds took a long time to germinate and I did not get very good germination. Then something ate my baby plants. None of my other peppers were eaten, so these must have been good :(

customer_reviews.title: OMG, this is so awesome...
customer_reviews.text: OMG, if you’re thinking about purchasing this kitchen cart, JUST DO IT!!!! I’m really particular about things since I’m an organizational freak, so when my granddaughter was recently born, I knew we had to have something for all of her bottles, formula, infant water and etc. This far exceeded my expectations. This kitchen cart currently holds several bottles, formula, gallons of water, pacifiers, drawer for coupons/small items, a bottle rack, storage containers, sterilizer (also purchased from Amazon) and still room for more...if you’re still reading this just add it to your cart because it has endless possibilities of how it can be utilized. Excellent purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Finish and Size!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this is a VERY solid cart with no particle board whatsoever. I am happy with the size, look and finish but do have 1 con. This beast took me a LOT longer than it should have to put together. NONE of the pieces were labeled and it drove me nuts. Some of the pieces look almost identical to others so with no markings it took me forever it seemed. Overall I am happy with the cart and we shall see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Markus

customer_reviews.title: Good island
customer_reviews.text: Fairly good product. Had it a few months and has held up well. All the parts came unbroken for me but the box was badely damaged in shipping so I could see how that could lead to a broken product but thats more an issue with the handlers. The only reason it got 4 stars from me was the assembly was a pain and the instructions were less than ideal. Once it was done, however, it was nice and all. The magnet for keeping the cuboard closed was very hard to install, ended up breaking through the wood on accident so it doesnt really stay closed. (Not part of it losing a star just a general warning).
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together despite the horrible directions
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on this before, easy to put together despite the horrible directions. Took my husband an hour and some change. With the indoor shelf removed, my kitchen aid does fit which I think is a plus. There is no adjustable notch holes inside, but my husband will add those later on to have a shelf above my kitchen aid. Rolls easily and you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brigette Eilers

customer_reviews.title: Way impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this, overall. Feels VERY high quality, sturdy as can be, and very attractive. Setup is tedious as can be, and the sheer amount of parts and user manual is very daunting. Took maybe an hour to build (mostly solo) but was well worth it!! Has been serving us great. The way the drawer slides out is pretty obnoxious, though. Difficult to slide unless it's at just the right angle. Minor nitpick. We just covered it in super sticky stuff while cooking and cleaning it off did nothing to the finish. Holds up well!
customer_reviews.author: EposVox

customer_reviews.title: Horrible instructions. Wobbles a bit.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are easily the worst I've ever used. The pictures are insufficient, and they accompany even worse text. IKEA instructions put these to shame, and that's saying a lot. It took 2 hours to complete assembly. Be careful with the hardware they give you, because every piece is needed. It's a decent unit once assembled, but it wobbles a little bit even though everything is tight. It says it's "espresso" colored, but it is so dark it really looks black. For the price and size, it was the best option I could find on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Sign of the time
customer_reviews.text: Quality control is terrible. Winsome customer service great. First countertop had a spot where they used filler then finished it over. Smooth but visually not good. Why ship this? Winsome sent a new one right away. But what a waste of time and $ for them and me when the factory could have rejected it in the first place. You are not winning customers by wasting their time. Can't blame Winsome, they probably don't own the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Moreball

customer_reviews.title: It was a pain to assemble, but totally worth it in the end
customer_reviews.text: It took me several hours to put this thing together, but it was worth it because I love it. The cart is very sturdy, has a ton of space, and is made of decent materials. It makes a great coffee station or kitchen island because of how tall it is. The surface has held up nicely, but i have started to put a few dents in it here and there. I plan on buying another one in the few years if it is still in production.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful addition to our kitchen, I'm so glad I bought it! Putting it together was not difficult at all. However, I checked all the pieces before putting it together to make sure there were no flaws, but, unfortunately discovered a piece with missing paint/stain after it was already halfway put together. Thankfully, it's on the side, near the handle so it's not as obvious and i could probably just paint that area myself with a matching color. other than that a really gorgeous kitchen cart.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cart but Hard to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking cart but the assembly directions are TERRIBLE. Drawings were very unclear. It took my husband and I several hours and the need for a Dremel to work on some parts that would not fit. And we are both pretty good at mechanical assembly but this cart really was a royal pain to assemble. Once we FINALLY got it put together it's a nice cart. Also, although it was packaged pretty well, one of the pieces (bottom of the drawer) arrived bent and cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L. May

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructions..
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking cart and is fairly solidly made. Complaints are not with the product but with the instructions which are so bad you almost laugh. All parts on the diagram have letters which you think, nice that will certainly help. The problem is, NONE of the parts are labeled and some look identical on the drawing. Secondly, the drawing is a mish mash of arrows and a few printed words with no sequencing on each page...so expect to put several pieces together and have to unscrew them and start over! Nice effort in building the cart, zero effort in instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Billy H

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the dimensions but the product came damaged AND ...
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the dimensions but the product came damaged AND with missing parts. Also, the door will not stay closed. It's almost like the hinges are too thick and the magnet that is supposed to stick it closed is too weak. Winsome shipped me the missing and damaged parts without hassle but i still wish i had invested in a cart that was built better instead. I guess i will look into options to reinforce the magnet in the hopes i will be able to get the door to close.
customer_reviews.author: MakgeolliBabe

customer_reviews.title: This cart is a beautiful and simple build
customer_reviews.text: This cart is a beautiful and simple build. I do have 2 issues with this cart. 1 the handle to push/pull the card is very loosely inserted and doesnt actually screw or lock into position. You can just physically pull the side and it would come out. there are some uneveness to fit in there but it looks and feels cheap. They could've designed that MUCH better without much effort. 2 the door does not close due to the hinge design. You push it in and the magnet is not strong enough to hold it in against the defective design of the hinge causing it to spring open about 1-2 inch.
customer_reviews.author: S. Truong

customer_reviews.title: good kitchen cart
customer_reviews.text: I received the product yesterday. It went together very nicely. I would recommend you do a parts inventory to make sure everything is there. This will also help understand all the major parts. This will make assembly go much smoother. The parts are engineered every well and fit together perfectly. If you have a part or assembly that does not fit you have done something wrong. I was very pleased to see quality wheels for the unit. It moves with out much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wuestenhoefer

customer_reviews.title: Get over the terrible instructions and figure it out.
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to people who can't use basic solving problem skills to put something together. While the instructions are garbage it's not hard to figure out based on the pictures. The pictures have labels but the physical pieces do not. Just match the picture with the pieces and label them yourself. Outside of putting it together it's a really great product. Super solid/sturdy pieces and it's gorgeous. Great addition to any kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: steviejay

customer_reviews.title: solid value and is very useful in a small place (like my studio apartment) to ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Seems durable, solid value and is very useful in a small place (like my studio apartment) to add mobile counter space. Cons: The assembly instructions are poorly written and very complicated. The magnet for the door is absolute trash, go buy one for a couple bucks at a hardware store and save yourself the hassle! All in all it's a 5 star piece but if you get it be sure to have a couple hours set aside to put it together while trying to understand the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough, nice counter top.
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in 2 hours by myself, a little hard at times holding a connecting piece up so that I could attach it but all in all it wasn't hard to figure out. Instructions were okay. I didn't need them. I like it and it looks nice in my kitchen. I am sure my dad would be glad that he taught his only girl how to figure things out without others help. I put some drawer liner on the top to avoid unsightly stains from anything I place on top of it for too long, such as a blender, knife block etc....
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Be still my cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart is all I was hoping for it to be, and then some. My husband and son put it together in about an hour. Only a mild amount of frustration seemed to be generated by this activity. The finished result is sturdy, bigger than I expected, loaded with storage space, and just gorgeous. It is a substantial, serviceable, stylish piece of furniture. I'm so enamored of this cart, I can't stop going into the kitchen just to look at it. I'm thrilled with the purchase and would recommend this cart to anyone needing an extra surface and additional storage in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and the price was great
customer_reviews.text: We received the first one a week ago. When we opened the box to put it together, I found a broken piece, called Amazon. Their reply was to send a replacement. Just one week to the day, we received it, put it together (my husband & I) in about an hour. It wasn't that bad putting it together (we used power tools) and wow it looks very nice and so was the price. We'd buy it again. Even though we had to have it replaced because of the broken piece, dealing with Amazon was painless.
customer_reviews.author: SFM0M

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to add to our kitchen and we love it! It took a long time to put it together, but it was easy to actually assemble. This is a very nice piece. The wood top is very nice to cook on and prep food. The shelving has a lot of room to put item. I wish the side had wires or poles to make sure things don't fall off the side, but tis okay. The drawer fits a 5-10 pots and bowls. The wheels are large and easy to roll around even when full. The small drawer on top is nice for silverware and other cooking ware.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen cart for the money
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier than I expected and really nice finished product. I was worried because people said it was hard to assemble, and while it wasn’t exactly simple, it was pretty straightforward if you followed the instructions. Only tricky bit was that the parts aren’t labeled, so you really need to check the diagrams and think about how it all fits together. Overall it was better quality than I had expected and makes a perfect coffee cart for our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. It seems really nice at first, but the build quality is crap. The shelves are super wobbly after installing, and pose a massive hazard to any small children that grab onto them or breakable items set on them. There are also lots of little, unsightly little gaps.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This cart is BEAUTIFUL. We're using it as a coffee/tea cart so we have more space in our smaller kitchen, and it's absolutely perfect. It was pretty obnoxious to put together and you definitely need more than one person to do so, but the finished product is way worth it. Make sure you line everything up absolutely perfectly, especially the door for the cabinet and where you put the magnet. But beyond that, it's really sharp looking and it's fantastic, sturdy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small kitchens.
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen cart ever!!! Function, function, function!!! We turned it sideways to fit in a small space in our kitchen. When we need to prep food, we easily pull it out for food prep, and slide it sideways back into the 17 inch wide space where we keep it.
customer_reviews.author: billmia

customer_reviews.title: Well made sevicable cart when you need storage space and extra counter top.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made very servicable cart when extra storage space and counter top is needed. We bought 3 woven baskets in black that fir on the shelves for draw like space. The wheels roll smoothly and are great to move unit around where you need it. Assembly directions are clear and straight forward once you layout and identify all your parts. Each part has a letter code on paper but I couldn't see that it was on the pieces. That would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gebbia

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to our kitchen/dining room space
customer_reviews.text: I moved to an apt with a smaller kitchen and little cabinet/counter space. This was a must for me. I had fun building this, one of the more complicated builds i've done, lots of parts. It's a 2 person build mainly i think because you have to start building it upside down and then flip it right side up and its rather heavy. I still did it by myself. I love it. Its really nice quality, and very sturdy. The wheel locks are great, but i can't very easily use my toes to pop them in place, oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Chynoweth

customer_reviews.title: Nice especially if you need extra counter space in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: It was well organized when I sorted out the packaging. The instructions were easy to follow although for part of the assembly it is much easier to put together if someone is helping you. Overall it is sturdy and the finish on the wood looks nice. The top easily supports a microwave and some other items. The shelves and cabinet are great for storing small items. The shelves are somewhat close together so unfortunately you can't store larger items on them.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: I really like how it turned out
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it turned out. I wished I had read the other review which detailed each steps to save my time in assembling. The middle piece should have installed first to ensure the alignment like the other review mentioned. The other difficult part for me is to put the drawe together. I wish winsome could ship an assembled drawer. It also took me a little effort to pushed the wheels into the holes. It took me at least 3~4 hours put everything together. But I totally enjoyed assembling process.
customer_reviews.author: stocknewbie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price. Takes a while to assemble though.
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with this. Came with all parts and hardware needed. Nothing damaged and everything lined up. It took a pretty long time to assemble. The instructions were a little tricky since none of the parts have stickers to identify them but only the very beginning of the construction requires close attention. Once first couple steps are complete it's obvious how to do the rest. Still will takes a chunk of time though.
customer_reviews.author: expert_101

customer_reviews.title: Read my whole review
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and made with real wood. Very great for the price. Directions not easy to follow. And pieces aren't marked so it's hard to tell which direction to face things. And when you look for a video on YouTube to follow it's hilarious. It just shows pictures of the put together cart amd plays a song that repeats "she's a f@#$ing G".😂. It also talks to you with a puppet that urges you to click a link below and then directs you to nowhere. I think is Singapore laughing at people that can't put it together. So funny!!!
customer_reviews.author: cramha

customer_reviews.title: Instructions need to be more detailed, beautiful when together!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews and decided I could return it if anything. It is exactly what I wanted, and with the help of my cousin who does drywall professionally, we figured it out. The instructions could be improved by giving more detail, and it wouldn't hurt to have wood glue around if you accidentally put something in a place you weren't supposed to. Also, those wooden pegs to cover the screw hole, well they pop out, regardless of how many times you try to hammer it in, so if you're determined...wood glue will be your ally!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: For $125, it's a great buy and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Took me a year to finally pull the trigger on this and I'm glad I did. It's very well constructed, mostly real wood and pleasant to look at in my kitchen. My only issue was with the towel holder but I think that was my fault. I quickly remedied that by buying longer screws at home depot. Also, the cabinet door was a little off but a quick whack on the adjoining panel to center it worked perfectly. For $125, it's a great buy and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but defective
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent piece. Good sturdy wood, relatively easy to assemble but the instructions are very confusing. Once assembled, the door doesn't fit properly. Instead of fixing this problem, the manufactures changed the instructions to include "to ensure proper fit, lift here and push here" making the bottom of the door scrape along the shelf which creates a very loud noise and damages the wood. My husband had to bend the hinges in order to make it fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lester

customer_reviews.title: Good item, terrible directions. Expect 2 hours to put together.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool product, and the price is right. It is quite a challenge to put together, and the directions some things to the imagination. (They are all pictures, no words) Imagine, if you will, typical IKEA furniture but with much worse directions. It took me about 2 hours to put together, however, I didn't need two people like it suggested. Space wise, it adds a good bit of counter space and it looks really nice. It came well packaged, unlike many similar products I've purchased before.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: good quality for the price. I gave it 4 stars on my first review but after my husband set it up for me, i am absolutely satisfied with this product and gave it 5 stars. You get exactly what is shown in the picture. The counter top has nice wood finish. Adequate space for plates or just for anything to help you get organized and get rid of clutter. It only took us less than an hour to assemble. Definitely not a piece of junk as other reviewers call it. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it wasnt bad to put together
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday. It was a little hard to assemble only because none of the parts were labeled. I had an idea of what went where. Started to put it together and ended up forgetting to put the back on the part of the cabinet and had to take the bottom back off to get the back part in. Other than that it wasnt bad to put together. I like the whole thing it was exactly what i was looking for, the only downfall is the back of the cabinet is very flimsy and the drawer is not on any metal track with wheels like im used to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Directions were good for someone familiar with do it yourself projects. Parts were all there. I assembled in two steps. First remove and identify all parts according to parts listed on assembly instructions. Later assembled according to instructions. Were not really detailed but for someone accustomed to do it yourself, workable, Only problem was when trying to line up back panel lower (FF) with vertical divider (GG) and cross support (EE). slots were hard to align but cleaning out slot and doing a little trimming on vertical support helped. Recommend a third / fourth hand at that point of assembly. Once assembled looks nice and feels sturdy. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Let me sleep!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but beware no build instructions is a common issue.
customer_reviews.text: The cart is beautiful and sturdy. Great for the money. I actually used it for a bedside table, so I didn't attach the wheels. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because it did not come with INSTRUCTIONS. Absolutely none. Upon a better look into the review, I noticed this is common issue for the product. The parts are pretty straight forward so I was able to put it together after a little finagling. Some people had some reviewed with cracked pieces, I did not come across that issue. Everything went together smooth and looks like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Vague instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice when put together! I would have gave it full stars if it wasn't for the vague instructions. No words, just bad pictures that were hard to see. There should be a web sight video on this to make it easier for the consumer to put it together. Thats why they give you vague instructions! They can charge you double the price to have it put together. A video would defeat that purpose. So plan on putting it together and taking it apart to get it right. Pictures are all they have in the instructions. Not very easy to understand. But when put together it is very beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Nesa R

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Five stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new island! I've read the reviews by other people on here that said they received their island damaged. I'm fortunate to have received mine in excellent condition. This is a great buy! You Will not be disappointed. I am a woman and put this together by myself. It took me an hour and a half. It makes a great coffee bar! Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with this product. It was packaged much better than most budget furniture, so none of the pieces were damaged. The quality of this cart is much better than I expected, other than the drawer. The lack of metal slides and loose fitment of the drawer makes it feel cheap. Other than that, this is a very well designed cart! Well worth the money. One point worth noting: Make sure to install the locking wheels in the front. Once installed, they are NOT coming back out.
customer_reviews.author: ccs192837

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our home theater concession stand!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Kitchen Cart to use as a concession stand in our home theater. I keep a mini fridge and old fashioned popcorn air popper on top of it, and use the rest of the cart storage for popcorn seeds, bins, scoops, butter & oil, and seasoning. The shelves we store any sodas that don't fit in the mini fridge. Then of course, you can put a roll of paper towels on the side that looks like a handle. I am extremely pleased with this cart. It has held up for almost a year now, and looks great in our theater. Assembly was a breeze! Please see my attached photo. :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately I wanted to love this item but it feels like when I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I wanted to love this item but it feels like when I ordered the item that Amazon asked me what difficulty I wanted the assembly to be and for some reason I selected hard. I really fail to see how this is even humanly possible to build by yourself, then again I'm not the most dexterous person ever and have nerve damage in my right arm so that could be it. It's not a piece but if I were you, I would get some help and be prepared to spend at least an hour constructing this. What would of made it a little easier is perhaps better directions including actual steps not just drawn diagrams.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together essentially by himself in about an hour without any problems. Seems very sturdy and is great in our small 1950s kitchen for added storage and counter space when needed, but can be wheeled away after cooking and for company to open up the limited kitchen space. The shelves are perfect for storing my 2 bins of spices and the bottom works for a few wine bottles. I haven't figured out what to put in the cabinet yet; maybe a better place for all the random stuff on top of my fridge. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I must have been the of the lucky ones. I rolled the dice and placed the order despite some reviews indicating missing/damaged/wrongly-sized components. Our unit arrived without mishap and everything was included. The cart looks awesome, and we have a high-end popcorn-maker on top and the related supplies in the cabinet. We now look forward to the fun task of stocking up the shelves with theater-appropriate candy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Hackworth

customer_reviews.title: Get this one! It's both solid and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: You are getting much more than you paid for with this cart! It is made of solid, stained wood. The entire piece is high-quality, right down to the casters. The only drawback is that the instructions are pictures only, no words, and the pieces are not labeled... but if you have any experience in putting together furniture and using a hex key, you can figure it out. It can be a bit frustrating, but the effort is completely worth the result. This is, by far, the nicest thing in our kitchen right now. (So, now I need to update and remodel the rest...;)
customer_reviews.author: June Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and has plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart. It is great looking, was easy to put together and has plenty of storage. There are 3 good size shelves on the left side and 3 inside the cabinet. The drawer is perfect for trivets and other misc items that get lost in my kitchen drawers. The top is very sturdy and is easy to keep clean. The towel holder on the right side is a nice touch, too. It can easily be moved if necessary thanks to wheels but they also have locks to keep it in place. The dark brown color looks great in my apartment, too. I am super happy with this cart and wish I hadn't waited so long to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Justine603

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Took a little over an hour for two of us to put together (the pieces aren’t labeled and it takes a while to figure out what goes where), but not too much hassle. The finish chips pretty easily and a shelf was a little cracked but we fixed it up with wood glue and it’s all good to go. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Zwier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart - I have a tiny kitchen and the extra cabinet and drawer is awesome. The cabinet easily fits my extra counter top appliances and the drawer fits stuff like plastic wrap and aluminum foil which I had no spot for before. It was easy enough to build and seems very sturdy so far. It’s awesome that it has wheels since I have to block my dishwasher access with it. It moves out of the way easily.
customer_reviews.author: DRAG0NFLIES

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy cart and it's well made. It was easy to assemble; it didn't pose any real problems and didn't take much time. I have it positioned in a place that requires I have to move it slightly at times and it moves easily and without any stress on the cart body (it stays in place otherwise without having to lock the wheels). The only issue is that the door doesn't close tightly because of the tightness in the hinges- that seems to be rectifying itself the more I open and close it; I'm sure it will be an easy fix once I take the time to work on it.
customer_reviews.author: NatB

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Horrible Assembly Instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Just put it together and I am very pleased with how it looks. Sturdy. Nice looking. But whoever wrote the instructions obviously didn't try to put it together. Kept running into snags and had to try a different order of assembly than recommended. 2 hours to assemble for me, but I had very little help. Instructions are also not really step by step. Each "step" contains 3-4 smaller steps which are unclear.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy after i figured out the right way it went
customer_reviews.text: got this because i have limited counter space in the kitchen. it now holds the microwave, baking ware, and pans, as well as knives. 4 stars because the instructions were only in pictures and put somethings together backwards because it was hard to tell which way it was supposed to go with out words to go along with the pictures, thus making me have to take it apart twice. very sturdy after i figured out the right way it went.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of furniture. Used as a coffee cart in my kitchen holds around 55 coffee mugs on the shelves a coffee maker, espresso machine and two coffee containers on the top with room to move around. Inside has great amount of storage space also. Have recommended to all of my friends - they love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!!
customer_reviews.text: As a regular buyer of ready to assemble furniture I normally dread purchasing. This was not the case with this item. Easy to assemble, excellent quality and fits well in my small kitchen. I highly recommend purchasing this cart!
customer_reviews.author: IA shopper

customer_reviews.title: ... I purchased this for our kitchen AND I'M SO GLAD WE DID
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased this for our kitchen AND I'M SO GLAD WE DID! The instruction were a little confusion, however, once we got everything laid out I all came together. It has great height and I we like the locking wheels on the bottom. The storage space inside will fit pot's/pans or whatever you decide. GREAT PRODUCT, WE ARE GIVING IT TWO THUMBS UP.
customer_reviews.author: MITCHELL SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price - does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: Solid item - especially given the price. You will likely run into the normal headaches of a piece of furniture you put together yourself - a hole drilled too small, etc. (at least I did and I wasn't shocked). Overall it is pretty nice quality and looks nice in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: tan - k

customer_reviews.title: This cart is affordable and looks pretty. I bought it because I needed a cart ...
customer_reviews.text: This cart is affordable and looks pretty. I bought it because I needed a cart to add counter space when I make my jam and jelly. The large cupboard holds all my canning supplies and then some. The wheels make it very easy to move any where in the kitchen. Would recommend to anyone who needs just a little extra counter top space once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Calisti

customer_reviews.title: ... went by the reviews on this item and was terribly disappointed. The finish is not consistent throughout
customer_reviews.text: I went by the reviews on this item and was terribly disappointed. The finish is not consistent throughout, there were some damages, and just overall, i'm not very happy with this item. If it wasn't such a hassle to return it, I would have gladly returned it. I put it in the rear of the formal dining room and will use it for storage, and I would never display it with guests present.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together! I put a lot of these types of things together so as long as you read the directions and match the items to the things in the picture it is easy to put together. Easier than Ikea furniture, but not as easy as Target's Threshold. It looks great put together and has lots of space to put items.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon "Educator"

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectatations! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before ordering and rolled the dice as it seemed like a toss up as to whether I’d receive a functioning product or a shipment of rubble. I’m glad to say I’m one of the lucky ones. The order arrived with all parts undamaged and all hardware components properly wrapped and sealed. Assembly took a little under two hours and the finished product exceeds expectations. Very sturdy and heavy duty for a small butcher block kitchen cart. Going to use as a coffee bar / prep station.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This turned out to be a great purchase for me
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a great purchase for me. I have a small kitchen (in a small house) and am always pressed for counter space. It arrived quick and my sister put it together before I arrived home. It fits my large microwave on top and I've used the shelves to store everything from canned goods to boxed crackers. The drawer is a great addition too. It's on the slender side, but blends in well enough with the entire cart that my toddler hasn't noticed it's a new place to explore.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: More counter space!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, just laid out all peiced in order, and had some help. Not hard to put together, but need electric screw driver to put drawer together. Great price. I needed more counter space and this is perfect. I highly recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Larson

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful cart when its together
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful cart when its together... but it took over 5 hours to put together because it was so poorly made. Holes were misplaced and had to re-create them.. the screws didnt fit properly... a huge mess, but we made it work eventually.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Very Attracive Addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cart. It gives you extra storage and counter space and is mobile. It was pretty easy to put together, especially since I had my son do it and it looks really nice in the kitchen. I bought it because our apartment doesn't have a lot of cabinet space. This helps, although I could use even more space, and it was a nice addition. Later when we buy a house or move we can always use it in the kitchen again or even as a TV stand. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!!! Shipped quick, arrived in perfect condition, and packed very well. Instructions were slightly hard to follow but we managed to get it together in about an hour or so, overall its perfect for what we needed and the wood is nice and sturdy ( pretty sure it's all solid wood as its pretty heavy) the stoppers on the wheels are also a nice feature!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cabinet - Good Quality - Nice Looking - Solid
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, very solid, good quality, and good looking. This cabinet is, I admit, a bit of a pain to put together - and the smell of paint is noticeable for a while. We've had it up about a month - we have a counter-top oven on it - and the smell is now completely gone. If it were easy to put together, also, I don't think it would have ended up quite as good-looking - or as solid. This is a nice, high-quality piece of furniture for a very reasonable price. Very solid and attractive. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but the directions are terrible
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time, it was very heavy, and a little beat up. Upon opening it was in good condition, and all the pieces were there. After taking inventory I realized that nothing was labeled. The directions are strictly drawings which can be extremely difficult to decipher. I am not Mr. Handyman and have put together many pieces of furniture etc. and these directions were the worst I have ever seen. It took approximately 3 hours to put it together. Ultimately we love the finished product. It is very sturdy, easy to move on wheels, and everything functions properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complicated to assemble, no instructions included but nice functional cart if you can put it together.
customer_reviews.text: This is a substantial piece of furniture well worth the money spent. However, if you are not good at solving puzzles and very mechanically inclined, I would not buy this cart. Assembly is complicated and mine came with no instructions at all. It took over 2 hours to assemble and fortunately I have some recent experience with the type of fasteners used to assemble this cart so I started the project ahead of the game.
customer_reviews.author: FSRGP

customer_reviews.title: Low quality materials and several things misaligned that I had to fix
customer_reviews.text: First, several of the parts that were screwed on were not in line so I had to unscrew the parts from the top piece and realign them. Second, this quality of this item is pretty poor and the particle board (I think that's what it is) can easily break or crack when screwing something in.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: but it's perfect! I took about 4 hours to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously hard to assemble, but it's perfect! I took about 4 hours to assemble, but I'm a beginner so if you're a pro it should take less time! It's great and I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Door can't close
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and put it all together. Everything fits okay (with some alignment issues), except the door. Because of the placement of the hinges, the door won't close. Also, there are no holes to screw on the magnet for the door. I bought this as a Mother's Day gift for my mom. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice item. The wood is good quality. All of the pieces were there in the box and it arrived un damaged. It looks really nice in the kitchen. From start to finish it took me about 2 hours to put this together with just the included allen wrench and my own screwdriver. I am an intermediate level of handiness and working with tools and I have put together my fair share of IKEA style furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Noley

customer_reviews.title: Looks so nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It has two locks on the front wheels so it can stay in place wherever I put it. I love that it has a cabinet and shelves. It took forever for my husband to put together but he was also watching tv when he was doing it so that might have added a little time. I looked at the directions and decided I was not the right person for the job. I hope it holds up in our busy household. It was just what we needed in our small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: knowledge is power

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for that spot
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we were looking for! Our kitchen needs remodeled but after 3+ years of other things taking priority I decided I needed something to fill the void of where our fridge is suppose to be, but does not fit. This was perfect for that spot. Only complaint was
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Recipient loves the look, beware of inappropriate shelf size though
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Recipient really enjoys the final look of the product and uses it to store their toaster oven, crock pot, George Foreman grill, and air fryer. Of note, unless you're a real handy-man, may require more than one person to put together. In addition, one of the shelves that goes on the side was the inappropriate size and was too small. Worked out okay in this situation as the recipient didn't want a third shelf in order to keep their air fryer there, but buyer beware if you're wanting a third shelf you may have to ask for the right sized shelf after the seller once you're done putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality! I’m a little disappointed the delivery guy left it in the leasing office instead of outside my actual apartment (I’m a single gal living on the 3rd floor, no elevator and had to go find help to carry it) but overall love it. It wasn’t that hard to put together either, i was pleasantly surprised. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Koren

customer_reviews.title: Great cart!
customer_reviews.text: This cart now acts as my coffee cart and I love it! It holds all of my (many) miscellaneous types of coffee, and brewing methods. I did have to add a clear coat to the top because water was spilling on it for a while and I didn't want the wood to get ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After a TON of Research, this was 100% the right call
customer_reviews.text: I looked around for quite a while to find the right Kitchen Cart to base my Cocktail Bar around. This was the right decision by far. The materials are all very solid and the assembly was pretty quick. The big critique I have of the product though is that the materials do not come labeled out of the box. If you can identify the individual components, which just takes a little bit of time, then you're good to go. At the end of the day, it is sturdy and really effective for storage.
customer_reviews.author: SteveMiller_PHX

customer_reviews.title: So you have to realize the size when buying this ...
customer_reviews.text: So you have to realize the size when buying this, this is smaller so that drawer is basically going to not be very deep. We put a layer of tongs along it and nothing much higher can go in there. It is very well built, it stores everything that we need it to. I wish this company made one in white, but, I'll get over it :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was a great cart. I needed something to put my silverware in and this worked great. It also has some small shelves that are great to put things on. It's all fabricated wood, but for the price, really isn't bad. I didn't have any of the issues that other posters did. Nothing was scratched and all the pieces fit together fine.
customer_reviews.author: Daugherty's In Charge

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on this cart are horrible to say the least! None of the pieces are labeled and there are no written instructions just diagrams. You literally have to match the slabs of wood with the pictures to see if you're using the correct piece. It took nearly three hours to put this cart together, however now that I have it together I really like it. Only buy this item if you have extreme patience or if someone else will be assembling it for you
customer_reviews.author: Nette1

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like this, but it really is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this, but it really is garbage. Mine arrived damaged, with a large chunk taken our of the side of the unit (despite the packaging bering relatively well intact). Instructions were simple enough, but nearly nothing lined up on the unit (took several tries of putting together/taking apart to get things to align. Slotted pieces of wood were next to impossible to install (slots did not align at all). Beyond that, the drawer is complete garbage ... it basically hangs out of the front of the unit – wooden tracks the drawer relies on are insanely loose (no metal tracks).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart! We needed a small kitchen island in our older house and this is a nice quality one that looks great on all sides. The cart is affordable and has real wood. It was a little confusing to assemble but it wasn't any harder than assembling Ikea furniture if you've done that before.
customer_reviews.author: H. Cygan

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart! Just the thing I needed for additional counter space, love being able to move it around. Fit and finish very good, but...the worst assembly directions I’ve ever seen! Took us quite awhile to get it put together. If the parts were marked, it would have been much easier. However, we’ll worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that i can't rate this with more than 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that i can't rate this with more than 5 stars, It was probably my best purchase in years. I live in a crappy apartment and for a wannabe home cook counter space is important and unfortunately I was severely lacking that. but this baby right here gives me more room to work and prep and i just love it
customer_reviews.author: Dmox21

customer_reviews.title: Product is nice, arrived for Christmas and was just opened
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice, arrived for Christmas and was just opened. Seems sturdy enough. Major downfall- There is a huge crack in the butcher block counter top (see picture). No way to have replacement of just one part- would have to ship back the entire cart and pay $$$$ shipping to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Jnb

customer_reviews.title: This kitchen cart looks really nice with the finishing
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen cart looks really nice with the finishing. Drawers, etc. have served my purposes. However, the wheels if you plan to use them aren't the most sturdy - the plastic covering will chip after a while if they're kept with the brakes on and the cart gets pushed every now and then. It'd be a little low without the wheels however (you can take the wheels off). It's an okay purchase but wheels could be more durable. However, there isn't another good option unless you pay much more.
customer_reviews.author: Hiten P.

customer_reviews.title: lovely cart
customer_reviews.text: Lovely cart- in general I am happy with this product. The counter top, cart itself are sturdy however the deviders are thin- ( back and middle of closed closet) There's a small pull out drawer that can handle light supplies because the base of the drawer is a thin wood palette. The instructions are not so user friendly since everything reference to letters. The Base of cart is strong Im able to store my stand mixer on the open side of the cart.. Last night I used it for rolling out dough and the wheels stayed in place. Despite some cons I think this cart is good and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY sunscreen (4) I use.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a decades old - still functioning well - baker's rack in my retro-type kitchen. It is heavenly. I was fortunate enough to have a GOOD friend assemble it - took her about 2 hours. It is simply smashing. Caution: The magnet that holds the door closed really isn't strong enough and requires a bit of maneuvering to get it closed. We think finding a stronger magnet will do the trick. GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Deary Lane

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, confusing assembly.
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet looks great. It's a sturdy piece of furniture. The assembly instructions were a little confusing, however after studying the pictures, we were able to figure out the right way to do it. I recommend this nice cart.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the reviews! Do not order!
customer_reviews.text: This is quite possibly the worst thing I've ever purchased from amazon. I knew assembly was required, but I didn't know that meant hours of piecing together a puzzle only for the pieces to be made incorrectly. The pieces are not labeled, so it's a real treat putting it together. It took two of an hour to get the main pieces assembled. When we finally got the cabinet door on, the holes were not aligned so the door would not shut flush like it is supposed to. I wish I would have bought a bar cart from Target. This was such a waste of time and looks cheap. Do not order!!!!
customer_reviews.author: seth quillin

product_meta.title: Winsome Mali Kitchen Cart
product_meta.description: Mali two-tone kitchen cart features natural wood top with dimesion 33-inch w by 18.5-inch d and espresso body with one large drawer, 3 shelves and cabinet with one removable shelf. Drawer inside dimesion is 24.80-inch w by 13.31-inch d by 2-inch h. 3-open shelf sizes 12.83-inch w by 15-3/4-inch d. Cabinet opening 13.39-inch w by 14.72-inch d by 22.44-inch h, door opening 13.22-inch w. Shelf inside cabinet is removable and fixed one position. Made of combination of solid and composite wood in natural and espresso finish. Assembly required.
feature_bullets: Kitchen cart with plenty of storage
The single drawer as well as the three side shelves offer plenty of room for storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,031 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
